sentence: He first earned the MAGA crowd's ire in January 2021 when he defended Rep. Liz Cheney, disliked by pro-Trump elements for her strident opposition to the former president.
author: Moshe Hill
title: Republicans need Dan Crenshaw

sentence: Some Republicans believe House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy's actions against Rep. Liz Cheney or silence when the party moves to punish her undermine his claim that the GOP is a big tent? party.
title: McCarthy picks his path on Cheney: Try to boot her from Congress

sentence: (CNN)House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy has endorsed Harriet Hageman, the Trump-backed opponent of incumbent Rep. Liz Cheney of Wyoming -- a rare endorsement from leadership in a divisive GOP primary, and one that marks the culmination of a simmering feud between the two powerful Republicans battling over the future of their party.
author: Ryan Nobles, Manu Raju and Melanie Zanona
title: McCarthy endorses Cheney foe in Wyoming GOP primary

sentence: No matter what happens during that conversation, if it occurs, some of his members saw a potential upside for McCarthy thanks to outside calls for Greene and Gosar to be removed from the conference outright: less right-wing pressure to oust Reps. Liz Cheney (R-Wyo.)
title: Why Republicans may let Greene and Gosar's latest brushfire burn itself out

sentence: Rep. Matt Gaetz (R-Fla.), who has called for Trump to run for Speaker instead of McCarthy, took a dig at McCarthy for sticking with Rep. Liz Cheney (R-Wyo.)
author: Emily Brooks
title: McCarthy's future hangs in limbo as Washington awaits Trump response
